content.title: Using Volt MX Automator
content.body:
1. From the left navigation bar, click Volt MX Automator.
    The Dashboard window appears.
    In the Dashboard window, you will see the test result of the test suite that you have run. You can see the number of passed and failed test cases.
  2. In the Results column, click the test suite file.
    The test suite result expands to provide more details.
  3. Close the Dashboard window.
